Expected Result: The Welcome Back screen is shown.

The Ether balance is shown on the overview.
The wallet address is shown on the overview.
The selected network is Ethereum Mainnet.

Test Steps: Switch networks to a test network.
Expected Result:
The Sepolia balance is shown on the overview.
The wallet address is shown on the overview.
The selected network is Sepolia.

Test Steps: Open the test dapp in another tab.
Confirm the transaction and wait for it to complete.
Switch to the wallet and open the activity list item.
Expected Result: The contract deployment transaction status, nonce, amount, gas and total are shown in the item details.

Test Steps: Confirm the transaction and wait for it to complete.
Switch to the wallet and open the activity list item.
Expected Result: The batch mint token transaction status, recipient's address, nonce, amount, gas and total are shown in the item details.

Test Steps: Switch to test dapp, click "Set approval for all" in ERC1155 token section.
Expected Result: Notification window is shown, asking user to allow access to all the minted ERC1155 tokens.

Test Steps: Proceed to confirm the tokens approval.
Expected Result: A prompt warning message "Your NFT may be at risk" is shown.
The "Approve token with no spend limit" transaction appears in the activity list.
The transaction status, recipient's address, nonce, amount, gas and total are shown in the item details.
The created, submitted and confirmed activity are shown in the activity log.

Test Steps: Proceed to view the transaction on the block explorer.
Expected Result: The block explorer opens in a new tab.
